title: jS Calculator
info: A calculator built with Brainnest Company, during the training month. I implemented also for fun dark mode and on/off switch button.

title: Tribute page
info: A single page website taliking about the history of one of my favourite punk band Ramones. The projects is built following the requirements on freeCodeCamp.

title: Survey Form
info: A survey form for an imaginary travel company. The projects is built following the requirements on freeCodeCamp.

title: Technical Doc Page
info: A single-page web site which talks about basic concepts about HTML and CSS. The projects is built following the requirements on freeCodeCamp.

title: Product Landing Page
info: A single-page web site for an imaginary company which sells armchairs. The projects is built following the requirements on freeCodeCamp.

title: Talking Tucan
info: Try this talking Tucan, but attention! He speaks only english at the moment. Project done during the Boolean Coding week.

title: Piano App
info: A very simple Piano App, made during the Boolean Coding week.

title: Rock, Paper & Scissors
info: Rock, Paper & Scissors game, built during the Brainnest Intensive training, qith a minimal and simple style.

title: Markdown Previewer
info: A Markdown Previewer built following the requirements on freeCodeCamp.

title: OddBlack EvenWhite
info: The project is made to partecipate the CodePen Challange about Even & Odd numbers. This is my simple idea of a project which includes them.

title: Drum Machine
info: I would call it Farm Machine, but the beginning project was a Drum Machine. The projects is built following the requirements on freeCodeCamp.

title: 25+5 Clock
info: A timer built using React. The rules and the behaviour follow the requirements asked by freeCodeCamp.

title: Random Quote Machine
info: A Random Quote Machine, which take data from an external JSON quote object. The projects is built following the requirements on freeCodeCamp.
